name: Wabbalidu
description:
This game is an experimental rhythm based highscore game in which you wanted through a hypnotizing  world.

CONTROLS

Look around with your mouse.  Change colors with Q(Red), W (Green), E (Blau).

THEME

The theme was "Anticipation".

THIS GAME WAS CREATED BY

  • Maximilian Meinicke
  • Nils Schwarz 
  • Linus Gärtig 

SOUNDTRACK

https://soundcloud.com/mderma/wabbalidu-ost

DISCLAIMER

This game may trigger nausea, epilepsy or other things. You play at your own risk.
